description: This file defines a custom UI theme called OceanTheme for an Android app using Jetpack Compose. It sets up a light color scheme with specific color tokens, typography, shapes, and a composable function to apply the theme to UI content.

methods.name: OceanTheme
methods.description: A composable function that applies the Ocean light theme to its content by wrapping it with MaterialTheme with custom color scheme, typography, and shapes.
